news.title: Most Trump tariffs ruled illegal by appeals court, dealing major blow to trade policy
news.summary: The appeals court stayed its ruling until Oct. 14, giving the Trump administration time to ask the Supreme Court to hear the case. The Supreme Court is expected to take up the case in the fall.

news.title: Here's what it really means for Trump to get control of the Federal Reserve board
news.summary: Since taking office in January, Trump has placed the Fed directly in the crosshairs of executive power. The Fed's chief, Janet Yellen, is expected to testify before Congress next week.

news.title: Spirit Airlines files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection for the second time in a year
news.summary: Spirit Airlines filed for bankruptcy protection again, just months after the budget carrier came out of Chapter 11 protection earlier this year. Spirit Airlines is a subsidiary of Spirit Airlines, which is owned by Spirit Airlines.

news.title: 'AI may eat software,' but several tech names just wrapped a huge week
news.summary: MongoDB, Pure Storage and Snowflake all touted artificial intelligence in earnings reports this week. MongoDB and Pure Storage are among the companies that touted AI in their earnings reports. Snowflake is a cloud storage company.

news.title: Fate of Fed Gov. Lisa Cook still up in the air after court hearing on Trump firing bid
news.summary: Lisa Cook's lawyer said "crazy midnight tweets" by housing official Bill Pulte about alleged mortgage fraud do not give President Trump cause to remove her.

news.title: ‘My blood pressure is sky high’: I’m in my 70s and a widow. I pay $12K a year for long-term-care insurance. Do I cut the cord?
news.summary: “What if I become cognitively impaired and need benefits for 15-20 years?” she asks. “What will I do when I’m in that situation?’

news.title: Nvidia has $57 billion in cash. Wall Street has ideas about what to do with it.
news.summary: Chip maker announced a $60 billion stock buyback this week. The move has sparked a debate about whether the move makes sense. The chip maker is based in Santa Clara, California.

news.title: Only a really big jobs report might stop the Fed from cutting interest rates. Don’t count on it.
news.summary: Hiring has slowed sharply this year. Hiring in the construction industry has been particularly slow this year in the U.S. It's been particularly tough in Texas.

news.title: Does the hot IPO market mean we’re in a stock-market bubble?
news.summary: The IPO market may be hotter than at any time since 2021, but it still is no more heated than the long-term average. The IPO market has been hotter than the average since the early 1990s.

news.title: We’re in our 70s and have $1.4 million. We pay $1,750 in rent. Will we run out of money in retirement?
news.summary: “Our adjusted gross income was $160,000 last year. We both also have fairly good health insurance..” she says.
